name: Iyad
title: UI/UX & Graphics Designer
about: Creative UI/UX Designer passionate about crafting user-friendly designs and memorable digital experiences. Skilled in wireframing, prototyping, and ensuring visual consistency across web and mobile platforms. Works closely with developers to implement pixel-perfect interfaces using modern design systems.

Experienced in project and client management, aligning business goals with user needs through strategic thinking and collaboration. Brings a strong understanding of product development, brand vision, and user behavior to every design challenge.

Also an electronics enthusiast with hands-on experience building and testing hardware projects. Constantly exploring new tools and workflows to bring innovative ideas to life and bridge the gap between design and development.

projects.name: HubZero UI Revamp
projects.desc: Redesigned HubZero’s web UI for a modern and responsive experience.
projects.longDesc: Led the redesign of HubZero’s interface with a focus on clean layouts, responsiveness, and brand alignment. Delivered reusable UI components and improved accessibility.
projects._comment: Project screenshot is optional and can be omitted if not available. Size should be 1280px x 450px.

projects.name: BhatkalTimeLuxe UI Design
projects.desc: Designed a luxury watch e-commerce interface for BhatkalTimeLuxe.in.
projects.longDesc: Delivered a sleek, premium UI for BhatkalTimeLuxe.in, focusing on elegant product presentation, seamless user flow, and mobile responsiveness. Collaborated with the client to align design with the brand’s upscale identity and implemented interaction-rich mockups for development handoff.
projects._comment: Project screenshot is optional and can be omitted if not available. Size should be 1280px x 450px.

projects.name: Automated Rain-Sensing Car Wiper
projects.desc: Built an automated wiper system that activates when it detects rain.
projects.longDesc: Developed a smart car wiper prototype using rain sensors and microcontrollers. The system automatically activates the wipers when rain is detected, enhancing driving safety and convenience. The project involved sensor calibration, circuit design, and relay-based motor control, with a focus on reliable real-time responsiveness.
projects._comment: Optional: Add real photo of the prototype or schematic.
